Description_lang: After activating Aerial Halt, experience a brief moment of weightlessness as the effects of gravity are reduced for $s1 sec.

description_blz.en_US: After activating Aerial Halt, experience a brief moment of weightlessness as the effects of gravity are reduced for 4 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Después de activar Alto aéreo, los efectos de la gravedad se reducen durante 4 s y experimentas una breve sensación de ligereza.
description_blz.pt_BR: Depois de ativar Parada Aérea, vivencie a sensação de não ter peso rapidamente com os efeitos da gravidade reduzidos por 4 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Nach Aktivierung von 'Flugstopp' erlebt Ihr einen kurzen Moment der Schwerelosigkeit, wenn 4 Sek. lang die Effekte der Gravitation verringert sind.
description_blz.en_GB: After activating Aerial Halt, experience a brief moment of weightlessness as the effects of gravity are reduced for 4 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Tras activar Freno aéreo, experimentas un breve momento de ingravidez durante 4 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Après avoir activé Halte aérienne, vous connaissez un bref instant d’apesanteur, où les effets de la gravité sont réduits pendant 4 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Dopo aver attivato l'effetto di Blocco Aereo, si sperimenta un breve momento di assenza di peso, durante il quale gli effetti della gravità sono ridotti per 4 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: После активации "Остановки в воздухе" вы на 4 сек. получаете эффект невесомости.
description_blz.ko_KR: 공중 정지 활성화 후, 4초 동안 중력이 약해지면서 일시적으로 무중력 상태를 경험합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在啟動空中急煞後，重力效果降低，持續4秒，讓人暫時體驗失重狀態。
description_blz.zh_CN: 激活空中急停时暂时获得失重体验，减轻重力的影响，持续4秒。
